attributes.action: insist guard dogs are kept behind a locked gate or barrier.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Dangerous guard dogs are being kept behind unlocked gates and fences becoming common in residential areas, police have no powers to insist on a locked secure containment and the breakout by a dog from a loosly chained or latched gate could easily result in injury and death. dangerous dogs must be behind a key locked barrier at all times without exception.
